'''Boom Balloons''', or '''Repelling Mines''', are obstacles found in certain quests and gliding-related challenges.

When touched, these objects explode and knock the player back in the direction from which they ran into them.

==Quests==
*[[The Third Experiment: Life]] ([[Albedo]]'s [[Story Quest]])
*[[Speech and Etiquette]] ([[Eula]]'s Story Quest)
*[[Operation Substitution]] ([[Sayu]]'s [[Hangout Event]])

==Events==
*[[Gliding Challenge]]
*[[Invitation of Windblume]], Floral Freefall
